abstract: Apple locks the iPhone, and hackers release it. Again.
snippet: Apple locks the iPhone, and hackers release it. Again.
lead_paragraph: Cat catches mouse. Mouse escapes. Apple released a new update for its phone software to coincide with the launch of the iPhone in Europe. This software closed the hole that allowed users to install applications from third parties, called a jailbreak. But hours later a group of hackers said they had found a new way to tunnel out of Apple’s iPenitentiary.
